segments.text: Yes , I'd like some information about the trains to Beijing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When do you want to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: On July 7 , I have to be there well before twelve o ’ clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There ’ s a train at 7 a . m . It'll get you there at 11 a . m . But there are many stops along the way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I have to get up early , too . Are there any non-stop trains to Beijing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , there is one at 8: 30 a . m . That arrives at 11:35 a . m .
segments.speaker: S1
